name: Arrows and Fireballs and Zombies, Oh My!
name_original: Arrows and Fireballs and Zombies, Oh My!
description:
A one button shooter made for RigidJam 9. The icons at the top of the screen show your upcoming ability (left) and current ability (right). Holding down the space bar lets you use your ability, releasing it changes your ability.

If the music sounds weird, that's because I forgot to tell it not to stop playing when you lose. Try refreshing the page after you die.

Sound Effects & Art:

Kenney Vleugels
Link: https://kenney.nl
License: https://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/zero/1.0/

Music:

Gothamlicious by Kevin MacLeod
Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/5741-gothamlicious
License: http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/
